mapper.select: select * from hwReply where hwNum=#{hwNum} order by hwReplyNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into hwReply (hwNum, username, comment, ref, step, depth) values(#{hwNum}, #{username}, #{comment}, #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth})
mapper.update: update hwReply set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>#{step}
